<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Paragon's Guard](/Feats.aspx?ID=412) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 151 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Requirements**
You are wielding a shield.

</column>

---

Once you've had a moment to set your stance, you always have your shield ready without a thought. While you are in this stance, you constantly have your shield raised as if you'd used the [Raise a Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98) action, as long as you meet that action's requirements.
name: Paragon's Guard
